prompt_base: compact sturdy humanoid, dark magenta artificial skin, large neon green rimless sunglasses, oversized dark felt hat, severe expression, 8k professional photo, cinematic lighting
feature_prompt: futuristic synthetic skin texture, sharp glass reflections, soft felt texture on hat, fine wool tuxedo fabric, subtle metallic sheen, detailed mechanical joints, subsurface scattering
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic, human skin tone, organic, deformed glasses, low quality, blurry face, (deformed hat:1.2), too vibrant, magenta pink
